Description:
Detects execution of NoFilter, a tool for abusing the Windows Filtering Platform for privilege escalation via hardcoded policy name indicators


Author: Stamatis Chatzimangou (st0pp3r)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - NoFilter Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '5447' and filtername like '%ronpolicy%') or (eventid = '5449' and providercontextname like '%ronpolicy%'))
